price: 112. Nabii Nuuc:usun abak sugen taamoomih ixxiga mayyu, cagalah anu ken kah seecam iimaanâ kalah keenik iyye.
arabic: قَالَ وَمَا عِلۡمِي بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla wamā ʿil'mī bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
